articles.description: The report highlighted that the global AIDS response was off track before the Covid-19 pandemic hit, but the rapid spread of the coronavirus has created additional setbacks.
articles.content: Geneva: The Covid-19pandemic interrupted contraceptive access for an estimated over 25 million couples in India, said a report by the Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS (UNAIDS).Health offici… [+2067 chars]

articles.title: WHO warns countries with falling cases to stay 'vigilant' - The Rahnuma Daily
articles.description: Geneva, Nov 28 (IANS) Countries with decreasing Covid-19 numbers still need to stay “vigilant”, a top World Health Organization (WHO) official said. “Even as case numbers are coming down, all countries need to remain vigilant. You’ve heard of this before, but…
articles.content: World Health Organization (WHO) Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus attends a daily press briefing on COVID-19 at the WHO headquaters on March 6, 2020 in Geneva. (Photo by FABRICE COFFRINI / … [+1436 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Bellamy
articles.title: Vaccine: Frankfurt Airport prepares for logistical challenge of a lifetime - Euronews
articles.description: As a string of COVID-19 vaccines near approval, Frankfurt Airport is preparing to transport millions of life-saving doses worldwide.

articles.title: United Kingdom records 15,871 coronavirus cases and 479 deaths - CGTN
articles.content:
The UK has recorded another 15,871 coronavirus cases and 479 deaths in the past 24 hours.
The number of cases is down on the 16,022 recorded on Friday and deaths are also down from 521.
